statements: UPDATE ProductLifeCycle SET manufacturing_process = 'Modified manufacturing process' WHERE product_id = 1
UPDATE ProductLifeCycle SET product_name = 'New Product Name', eco_impact_assessment = 'Enhanced eco impact assessment' WHERE product_id = 2
UPDATE ProductLifeCycle SET manufacturing_process = 'New process for efficiency improvement', eco_impact_assessment = 'Reduced carbon footprint' WHERE product_id = 1
UPDATE ProductLifeCycle SET eco_impact_assessment = 'Recycled materials used in manufacturing', manufacturing_process = 'Improved sustainability practices' WHERE product_id = 2
UPDATE products SET category = 'Electronics' WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE assessments SET assessment_result = 'PASS', assessment_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE product_id = 2;
UPDATE products SET category = 'Electronics' WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE assessments SET assessment_result = 'Passed', assessment_date = '2022-10-20' WHERE product_id = 2;
UPDATE product_life_cycle SET life_cycle_stage = 'Matured' WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE environmental_impact_assessment SET waste_production = 500.5, energy_consumption = 250.3 WHERE assessment_id = 201;
UPDATE product_strategy SET eco_friendly = TRUE WHERE product_id = 1000;
UPDATE environmental_impact_assessment SET energy_consumption = 500.25, waste_production = 80.75 WHERE assessment_date > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE Product SET price = 15.99, category = 'Electronics' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE GreenSupplyChain SET certification_status = 'Certified', production_location = 'USA' WHERE product_id = 2;
UPDATE Product SET price = price * 1.1, category = 'Electronics' WHERE id = 100;
UPDATE GreenSupplyChain SET certification_status = 'Verified', supplier = 'Eco-Friendly Suppliers' WHERE product_id = 200;
UPDATE products SET price = 19.99, category = 'Electronics' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE suppliers SET location = 'New York', contact_person = 'John Doe' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE products SET price = 25.99, weight = 1.250 WHERE id = 101;
UPDATE purchases SET quantity = 50 WHERE id = 201;
